## JsonRpcProvider.queryAsk() method

returns a signed StorageAsk from the specified miner.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
queryAsk(peerId: PeerID, miner: Address): Promise<SignedStorageAsk>;
```

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  peerId | PeerID |  |
|  miner | Address |  |
